messages.subject: Next gen Was Re: World of Warcraft ( was: Advice needed)
messages.msgSnippet: DS has already said, at 10 yrs old, that he plans to unschool his kids. I ve discussed with him that his someday partner will have a say in it. He s said that
messages.messageBody:
DS has already said, at 10 yrs old, that he plans to unschool his kids.
I've discussed with him that his someday partner will have a say in it.
He's said that if he marries someone who has a good job, then he can
stay home and unschool the kids - no gender stereotypes there, he's used
to me working and DH staying home with him. Not only does DH handle the
yard work and taking out the trash and home repair stuff, but he ALSO
grinds the grain to make the flour to make the most awesome baked goods
(bread, bagels, crackers, pasta, pizza...) and cooks excellent meals,
does the laundry and the dishes, is an A1 gamer and enjoys playing with
DS on various games/systems, etc. And he's MINE all MINE and you can't
have him LOL!

Deb R
